short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents zooming from being applied to an entire site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides Chrome's default behavior of applying zoom so that it is only applied to the current tab. Existing site zoom settings may need to be removed at chrome://settings/contentExceptions#zoomlevels
